label: ipp_non_cogen
description: Independent power producers which are not cogenerators.

label: ipp_cogen
description: Independent power producers which are cogenerators, but whose primary business purpose is the same of electricity to the public.

label: commercial_non_cogen
description: Commercial non-cogeneration facilities that produce electric power, are connected to the grid, and can sell power to the public.

label: commercial_cogen
description: Commercial cogeneration facilities that produce electric power, are connected to the grid, and can sell power to the public.

label: industrial_non_cogen
description: Industrial non-cogeneration facilities that produce electric power, are connected to the grid, and can sell power to the public.

label: industrial_cogen
description: Industrial cogeneration facilities that produce electric power, are connected to the grid, and can sell power to the public
